about_the_game:
Everything was peaceful until the meteor struck the ground, while Draid was relaxing in the forest. It's up to him to discover this old magical object that fell from the skies, and to save his forest from its evil force. The game contains many old-style game-play features, Camera angles, Puzzles, Power-ups, and Secrets, But with new graphical technologies!

This is just a demo of the original game. It only includes some levels.
